p.d: One day a film-maker drops his screenplays and yields to his desire to film. To film the people he loves, the light he loves, his journeys and the love he encounters. Made over three years "The Sacred Fire" tries to show how filming is simply another way of expressing love! Directed by: Arthur Joffé (France, 2015) Cast: Arthur Joffé, Maurice Lamy, Dominique Pinon, Dina Morgan, Paul Minthe, Kamel Sherif, Sandrine Le Berre, Sophie Parel Genre: documentary
